Producer: Richard Linklater, Christos V. Konstantakopoulos, Sara Woodhatch
Screenwriter: Richard Linklater, Julie Delpy, Ethan Hawke
Production Co: Faliro House, Castle Rock Entertainment, Venture Forth
Synopsis: On the last night of their idyllic Greek vacation, longtime lovers Jesse (Ethan Hawke) and Celine (Julie Delpy) reminisce about their lives together and what different choices might have brought.
Title: Before Midnight
